si.title: ප්රශ්නාවලිය යැවීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් ගුරුවරිය අත්අඩංගුවට
body_lines: අපරාධ විමර්ශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ නිලධාරීන් ඉරිදා (12) සැකකරු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.
උදේ 8.30 ට ඉංග්රීසි විභාගය ආරම්භ වූ විට, කතුවරයා උදේ 9.11 ට වට්ස්ඇප් හරහා ප්රශ්න පත්රය යවා ඇත. අත්අඩංගුවට ගත් සැකකරු අධිකරණයට ඉදිරිපත් කිරීමට නියමිතය.

en.title: Teacher arrested for sending the questionnaire
body_lines: Additional Class Teacher has been arrested in connection with the alleged incident of what has been sent by the WhatsApp on Thursday (09) at the ongoing GCE Ordinary Level Examination.
Criminal Investigation Department officials arrested the suspect on Sunday (12).
As the English Examination commenced at 8.30 am, the author sent the Question Paper via WhatsApp at 9.11 am. The arrested suspect is to be produced in court.

summary_lines: A teacher was arrested for allegedly sending a GCE Ordinary Level exam paper via WhatsApp during the exam, disrupting the test. The incident occurred on Thursday, and the teacher was arrested on Sunday. The case is now in court.
